title: 3dBrickStat
description: Compute voxel statistics of an input dataset

quick.title: Quick flag
quick.description: Get the information from the header only (default)

slow.title: Slow flag
slow.description: Read the whole dataset to find the min and max values

min.title: Minimum value flag
min.description: Print the minimum value in dataset

max.title: Maximum value flag
max.description: Print the maximum value in dataset (default)

mean.title: Mean value flag
mean.description: Print the mean value in dataset

sum.title: Sum value flag
sum.description: Print the sum of values in the dataset

var.title: Variance value flag
var.description: Print the variance in the dataset

stdev.title: Standard deviation flag
stdev.description: Print the standard deviation in the dataset

count.title: Count flag
count.description: Print the number of voxels included

volume.title: Volume flag
volume.description: Print the volume of voxels included in microliters

non_positive.title: Non-positive flag
non_positive.description: Include only voxel values 0 or negative

non_negative.title: Non-negative flag
non_negative.description: Include only voxel values 0 or greater

non_zero.title: Non-zero flag
non_zero.description: Include only voxel values not equal to 0

absolute.title: Absolute value flag
absolute.description: Use absolute value of voxel values for all calculations

nan.title: NaN value flag
nan.description: Include only voxel values that are NaN or inf. Forces -slow mode.

nonan.title: Exclude NaN value flag
nonan.description: Exclude voxel values that are NaN or inf.

mask.title: Mask dataset
mask.description: Use the specified dataset as mask to include/exclude voxels

mrange.title: Mask range
mrange.description: Only accept values between MIN and MAX (inclusive) from the mask

mvalue.title: Mask value
mvalue.description: Only accept values equal to VAL from the mask

automask.title: Automask flag
automask.description: Automatically compute mask for dataset. Cannot be combined with -mask.

percentile.title: Percentile values
percentile.description: Compute and print percentile values from p0% to p1% at a step of ps%. Only one sub-brick is accepted as input with this option.

perclist.title: Percentile list
perclist.description: Like -percentile, but output the given percentiles

perc_quiet.title: Percentile quiet flag
perc_quiet.description: Only print percentile results, not input percentile cutoffs
